name: floating-cart-for-woocommerce
title: Floating Cart for WooCommerce
description: Adds a floating cart to your shop.

scripts.build: npm run uglify && npm run makepot && npm run sass
scripts.build-zip: npm run build && npm run -s archive
scripts.uglify: for f in assets/js/*.js; do file=${f%.js}; node_modules/.bin/uglifyjs $f -c -m > $file.min.js; done
scripts.postsass: for f in $npm_package_assets_styles_css; do file=${f%.css}; node_modules/.bin/cleancss -o $file.css $f; done
scripts.makepot: wpi18n addtextdomain $npm_package_name; wpi18n makepot --domain-path languages --pot-file $npm_package_name.pot --type plugin --main-file $npm_package_name.php --exclude node_modules,tests,docs,vendor
